alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 23 at 12:49PM MDT until March 24 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM CDT /10 AM MDT/ TO 9 PM CDT /8 PM MDT/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph are expected. * WHERE...Portions of Southeast New Mexico and most of West Texas. * WHEN...From 11 AM CDT /10 AM MDT/ to 9 PM CDT /8 PM MDT/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Blowing dust may result in localized visibility reductions.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Southern Lea County
